title: Grilled tuna burgers
ingredients: ['675g fresh tuna steaks, finely chopped', '55g dried breadcrumbs', '4 tablespons finely chopped spring onions', '4 tablespoons grated carrot', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh root ginger', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon tomato ketchup', '1 tablespoon light soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon black pepper', '1 egg, beaten', 'To serve', '6 burger buns', '6 lettuce leaves, rinsed and dried', '2 medium tomatoes, sliced']
